entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Varennes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
